translations: 得意洋洋；精力充沛；因自信而流露的喜悦

sentences.sentence: True, there will be patches of perkiness in the emerging world.
sentences.translation: 就业不足的微弱的复苏将在很多国家出现。

sentences.sentence: And smile enforcement is just the beginning; a whole SLATE of behavior-recognition software will someday pick people out of a crowd for insufficient perkiness.
sentences.translation: 而且微笑执法只是一个开始，一整套行为-识别软件某一天将能够把某个不活跃的人从人群中挑出来。
